channel.title: Warcraft on AI Collector

item.title: Enabling CrossOver to Play Warcraft 3 on Mac
item.description: Warcraft 3 is a classic real-time strategy game. Although primarily designed for Windows, Mac users can also run the game smoothly using CrossOver. This article provides a detailed guide on how to configure and run the original Warcraft 3 (non-Reforged version) on Mac.
